Hammock:ing hammocks can be an excellent alternative to sleeping in a bed. They are comfortable, easy to set up, and can be hung from trees or other sturdy structures.
Air mattress: An air mattress is a great option for those who want a comfortable and easy-to-inflate sleeping surface. They can be used indoors or outdoors and can be easily deflated for storage.
Futon: A futon is a foldable bed that can be easily stored and transported. They are comfortable and can be used in a variety of settings, from apartments to camping trips.
Sleeping bag: A sleeping bag is a great option for those who want to sleep outdoors. They are warm, comfortable, and can be used in a variety of settings, from tents to the ground.
Couch: If all beds disappeared, sleeping on a couch could be a viable option. Couchs are comfortable and can be used in a variety of settings, from apartments to outdoor spaces.
